- üßëüèΩ‚Äçüíª My real name is Aarav Bundela (pronounced like Aah-rahv Boon-day-la).

- üáÆüá≥ I‚Äôm a 16-year-old developer from India.

- ‚ù§Ô∏è My favorite languages are Kotlin, Java, PHP, TypeScript, and JavaScript.

- üíª I also know Python, Go, Rust, C, C# and a bit of C++ and Ruby.

- üå± I'm currently learning Swift, Flutter and TensorFlow.

- üíû I‚Äôm looking to collaborate on my open-source projects.

- ‚ú® Most of my official work can be found [here](https://github.com/Altiran).

- ‚ùì Ask me about anything [here](https://github.com/Ab20zip/ab20zip/issues).

- üòÑ Pronouns: he/him.

- ‚ö° Fun fact: My username is pronounced "Ayy bee twenty zip."
